mapper.sql:
id, dept_id, account, nick_name, user_type, email, phonenumber, avatar,
password, status, login_ip, login_date, remark, creator_id, creator_name, create_time,
updater_id, updater_name, update_time, deleted
mapper.insert:
insert into mybox_dev.sys_user(dept_id, account, nick_name, user_type, email, phonenumber, avatar, password, status, login_ip, login_date, remark, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, updater_id, updater_name, update_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.deptId}, #{entity.account}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.userType}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.phonenumber}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.loginIp}, #{entity.loginDate}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.creatorId}, #{entity.creatorName}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updaterId}, #{entity.updaterName}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.deleted})
on duplicate key update dept_id = values(dept_id) , account = values(account) , nick_name = values(nick_name) , user_type = values(user_type) , email = values(email) , phonenumber = values(phonenumber) , avatar = values(avatar) , password = values(password) , status = values(status) , login_ip = values(login_ip) , login_date = values(login_date) , remark = values(remark) , creator_id = values(creator_id) , creator_name = values(creator_name) , create_time = values(create_time) , updater_id = values(updater_id) , updater_name = values(updater_name) , update_time = values(update_time) , deleted = values(deleted)
